Posts.Content: Quote: Originally Posted by britishlass Im still in a fog, got my partial results today, I have invasive ductal carcinoma. Two areas in my left breast, dont have the receptors yet. Im in a bit of shock, have hashimotos with thyroid nodule, thought if I was going to get cancer it would be there, not on my breast. Sorry, still not quite got my head wrapped around this yet. My question is, where do you go from here? Im being referrered to a general surgeon for all of my results and options, should I be seeing another type of specialist. Thanks for any advice. My heart goes.out to you
Posts.Title: Wow - Its cancer!
